function updateDocumentState() {
var db = new DocumentManagementDB(); var documentId = current.document;
var noneDraftFound = false;
var revisions = db.getRevisionsByDocumentId(documentId);
for ( var i = 0; i < revisions.length; i++) { if (revisions[i].stage != DocumentManagement.draft) { noneDraftFound = true; break; } }
if (noneDraftFound) { var document = db.getDocumentById(documentId, true); document.state = DocumentManagement.active; document.update(); } }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>felix.bait</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2011-04-08 08:31:48</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>34219a100a0a2c694f50e70829b6ba4d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update Document</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">8bc69e38db2f515086a072c7f496195f</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_34219a100a0a2c694f50e70829b6ba4d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>felix.bait</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2011-04-08 08:49:32</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=34219a100a0a2c694f50e70829b6ba4d"/> </record_update>
